general.name: allVisit
general.description: The allVisit_RESULTS-VERS.fits file contains summary information for every visit of each star in the data release.

surveys.name: APOGEE-2
surveys.long: Apache Point Observatory Galactic Evolution Experiment 2
surveys.description: An infrared stellar spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars in the Northern and Southern hemispheres

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

header.value: FITS (Flexible Image Transport System) format is defined in 'Astronomy

hdu1.name: APOGEE reduction visit-level summary table
hdu1.description: Contains all final data product and summary information for every observed visit (by the relevant telescope) in the data release.

target_id.name: target_id
target_id.description: Unique ID for visit spectrum, of form apogee.[telescope].[cs].[apred_version].plate.mjd.fiberid (Primary key)

uri.name: uri
uri.description: Uniform Resource Identifier.  Full path information for the apVisit file

plate.name: plate
plate.description: Plate (for plate era) or configurationID (for FPS era) of this visit

mjd.name: mjd
mjd.description: Modified Julian Date of the night

telescope.name: telescope
telescope.description: String representation of of telescope used for observation (currently apo25m or lco25m)

healpix.name: healpix
healpix.description: HEALPix number for this star, nside=128

pmra.name: pmra
pmra.description: Proper motion in right ascension used in target selection

pmdec.name: pmdec
pmdec.description: Proper motion in declination used in target selection

pm_src.name: pm_src
pm_src.description: Source of proper motion used in target selection

apogee_target1.name: apogee_target1
apogee_target1.description: Bitwise OR of first APOGEE-2 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions

apogee_target2.name: apogee_target2
apogee_target2.description: Bitwise OR of second APOGEE-2 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions

apogee_target3.name: apogee_target3
apogee_target3.description: Bitwise OR of third APOGEE-2 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions

apogee_target4.name: apogee_target4
apogee_target4.description: Bitwise OR of first APOGEE-2 target flag of all visits, see bitmask definitions

ra_sdss_id.name: ra_sdss_id
ra_sdss_id.description: Right Ascension of unique SDSS-V sdss_id object

dec_sdss_id.name: dec_sdss_id
dec_sdss_id.description: Declination of unique SDSS-V sdsss_id object

sdss5_target_flagshex.name: sdss5_target_flagshex
sdss5_target_flagshex.description: SDSS-V carton flags as hexadecimal string

gaia_pmra.name: gaia_pmra
gaia_pmra.description: Gaia proper motion in Right Ascension

gaia_pmra_error.name: gaia_pmra_error
gaia_pmra_error.description: Uncertainty in Gaia proper motion in Right Ascension

gaia_pmdec_error.name: gaia_pmdec_error
gaia_pmdec_error.description: Uncertainty in Gaia proper motion in declination

gaia_gerr.name: gaia_gerr
gaia_gerr.description: Uncertainty in Gaia G mean magnitude

gaia_bperr.name: gaia_bperr
gaia_bperr.description: Uncertainty in Gaia BP mean magnitude

gaia_rperr.name: gaia_rperr
gaia_rperr.description: Uncertainty in Gaia RP mean magnitude

targflags.name: targflags
targflags.description: Verbose/text form of APOGEE-1 target flags

starflag.name: starflag
starflag.description: Star-level quality flags as taken from bitwise OR of individual visits, see bitmask definitions

starflags.name: starflags
starflags.description: Star-level quality flags as comma-delimited ASCII text

starver.name: starver
starver.description: Star combination version (MJD of last visit used) that this visit was used for

bc.name: bc
bc.description: Barycentric correction for the observation date and location

vrel.name: vrel
vrel.description: Relative velocity (doppler shift) of the visit spectrum relative to the Doppler template

vrad.name: vrad
vrad.description: Radial velocity in the Solar System Barycentric frame

chisq.name: chisq
chisq.description: Reduced chi-squared of the Doppler best-fit model

rv_teff.name: rv_teff
rv_teff.description: Effective temperature of Doppler RV template match

rv_logg.name: rv_logg
rv_logg.description: log g of Doppler RV template match

xcorr_vrel.name: xcorr_vrel
xcorr_vrel.description: Doppler shift of individual visit spectrum relative to the best-fit Doppler model using cross-correlation

xcorr_vrelerr.name: xcorr_vrelerr
xcorr_vrelerr.description: Error in doppler shift for individual visit

xcorr_vrad.name: xcorr_vrad
xcorr_vrad.description: Barycentric radial velocity for individual visit using cross-correlation with best-fit Doppler model

n_components.name: n_components
n_components.description: Number of components from cross correlation
